title: Foxconn chairman says AI investment boom 'still has some time to go' as language models evolve
content: Foxconn Chairman Young Liu told CNBC the artificial intelligence boom "still has some time to go" as AI models are become more and more intelligent.
summary: Foxconn Chairman Young Liu told CNBC the artificial intelligence boom "still has some time to go" as AI models are become more and more intelligent.

title: China stocks poised to reopen with markets fixated on fiscal stimulus

title: Google ordered to open Android app store in Epic Games trial
content: Google will be restricted from paying fees or sharing revenue with companies in exchange for them choosing to not compete with Google's app store.
summary: Google will be restricted from paying fees or sharing revenue with companies in exchange for them choosing to not compete with Google's app store.

title: Chinese travelers trickle back to a Taiwanese island, mere miles from the mainland
content: Tourism has slowly started to resume on Kinmen, a remote Taiwanese island 1.8 miles from China that once thrived on visitors from the mainland.
summary: Tourism has slowly started to resume on Kinmen, a remote Taiwanese island 1.8 miles from China that once thrived on visitors from the mainland.

title: No case for more jumbo rate cuts by the Fed, strategists say
content: There is no case for more 50-basis-point rate cuts by the Federal Reserve, veteran market strategists told CNBC.

title: This 42-year-old built a $2 billion a year super app called Grab: I worked '20 hour' days
